mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.cover, count(mp.music_id) as music_count, a.username as author from user_playlist up left join playlist p on up.playlist_id = p.id left join account a on p.creator = a.id left join music_playlist mp on p.id = mp.playlist_id where up.account_id = #{userId} group by p.id, p.title, p.cover, a.username order by id desc limit #{size} offset #{offset};

select m.id, m.name, m.singer, m.duration, m.album, fim.size, fim.mime, fim.filename as link, fic.filename as cover from music_playlist mp inner join music m on mp.music_id = m.id left join file_info fim on m.music_file_id = fim.id left join file_info fic on m.cover_file_id = fic.id where mp.playlist_id = #{playlistId} order by mp.music_id
limit #{pageParam.size} offset #{pageParam.offset};

select p.id, p.title, p.cover, count(mp.music_id) as music_count, p.create_time, p.introduction, p.accessible, a.username as author from playlist p left join account a on p.creator = a.id left join music_playlist mp on p.id = mp.playlist_id where p.id = #{playlistId} group by p.id, p.title, p.cover, a.username

select p.id, p.title, p.cover, count(mp.music_id) as music_count, a.username as author from playlist p left join account a on p.creator = a.id left join music_playlist mp on p.id = mp.playlist_id
and p.accessible = true and (p.title like #{key} or a.username like #{key})
group by p.id, p.title, p.cover, a.username order by id desc
limit #{pageParam.size} offset #{pageParam.offset};
